quick.description: Trivial changes, single-file fixes, minor tweaks
quick.prompt_append: Keep changes minimal and focused. Follow .agent/rules/.

business-logic.description: Domain logic, topology operations, simulation algorithms
business-logic.prompt_append: Follow the repository rules under .agent/rules/ (topology-first, spec-driven). Do not modify documentation unless explicitly asked.

ultrabrain.description: Complex architecture, deep reasoning, spec design
ultrabrain.prompt_append: Apply topology-first doctrine. Reference v2 RFCs in ../fantasim-hub/docs/rfcs/v2/. Enforce tiered service architecture.

writing.prompt_append: Write clear, concise technical documentation. Follow existing RFC and ADR formats.

unspecified-high.description: Generic high-effort tasks requiring careful reasoning

spec-driven.description: Injects spec-first mindset and topology-first doctrine
spec-driven.prompt: Before implementing, read and understand relevant specs in ../fantasim-hub/docs/rfcs/v2/. Keep contracts stable. Enforce 'derived stays derived' - sampling/products must never become truth dependencies.

tiered-arch.prompt: T1 interfaces in project/contracts/. T2 proxies co-located with T1, resolve via IRegistry. T3 implementations in project/plugins/. T4 providers must not leak above T3.
